entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
